name: chatgpt-shared-conversation-to-markdown-file
description: CLI to download a ChatGPT share link and save it as clean Markdown.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/csctm --external electron --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/bidiMapper/BidiMapper --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/cdp/CdpConnection
scripts.build:mac-arm64: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/csctm-macos-arm64 --external electron --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/bidiMapper/BidiMapper --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/cdp/CdpConnection
scripts.build:mac-x64: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/csctm-macos-x64 --external electron --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/bidiMapper/BidiMapper --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/cdp/CdpConnection
scripts.build:linux-x64: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/csctm-linux-x64 --external electron --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/bidiMapper/BidiMapper --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/cdp/CdpConnection
scripts.build:linux-arm64: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/csctm-linux-arm64 --external electron --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/bidiMapper/BidiMapper --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/cdp/CdpConnection
scripts.build:windows-x64: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/csctm-windows-x64.exe --external electron --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/bidiMapper/BidiMapper --external chromium-bidi/lib/cjs/cdp/CdpConnection
scripts.build:all: bun run build:mac-arm64 && bun run build:mac-x64 && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:linux-arm64 && bun run build:windows-x64
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck
